name: Microscopic
description:
What happens to your body when it experiences joy, sadness, anger, or even fear? Kaelin was dared by Joe to climb a rock ridge. However, as she climbs, she misses her step and fear takes over.

You play the role of a cell inside of Kaelin's body. It is your job to adventure through the brain to deliver a message to the brain and back. Feel the difficulty in finding the correct path towards the brain. Feel the pressure of returning back to Kaelin and give her the courage to the top of the ridge.

Remember that patience is key! Only one key will open the true path.

NOTE: There is a known bug when the game is played in windowed mode.
